The hologram does not attack; When the hologram is attacked, inflict 27% <@ba.talpu>(+2%)</><$ba.fragile>Fragile</> to the attacker for 10 seconds and remove <$ba.invisible>Invisibility</>, then immediately swap to <Substitute>

uniequip_002_iana.name: 双子分身复制器
uniequip_002_iana.CN: 部署时原地释放全息幻影，该幻影不会攻击，受到攻击时使攻击幻影的敌人在8秒内受到20%的脆弱且隐匿效果失效，并立即切换为<替身>作战

The hologram does not attack; When the hologram is attacked, inflict 30% <@ba.talpu>(+2%)</><$ba.fragile>Fragile</> to the attacker for 10 seconds and remove <$ba.invisible>Invisibility</>, then immediately swap to <Substitute>

uniequip_003_ash.name: Auxiliary Equipment
uniequip_003_ash.upgradeDescription: After deployment, immediately throw a Stun Grenade at an enemy within range, <$ba.stun>Stunning</> them and nearby enemies for 5 seconds, Ash deal addition physical damage for 7% to <$ba.stun>Stunned</> enemies for 5 seconds

uniequip_003_ash.name: Auxiliary Equipment
uniequip_003_ash.upgradeDescription: After deployment, immediately throw a Stun Grenade at an enemy within range, <$ba.stun>Stunning</> them and nearby enemies for 6 seconds, Ash deal addition physical damage for 10% to <$ba.stun>Stunned</> enemies for 6 seconds

uniequip_002_mlyss.name: Pure Water is Life
uniequip_002_mlyss.upgradeDescription: Can summon a Flowing Shape to assist in combat. Flowing Shapes can partially copy an undeployed Operator's attributes (Max HP, ATK, DEF, RES, Block Count, Attack Interval, Attack Range, Damage Type, and obtain a special trait depending on whether in melee or ranged form), gain 5 SP after first deployment, will respawn 25 seconds after being defeated

uniequip_002_mlyss.name: Pure Water is Life
uniequip_002_mlyss.upgradeDescription: Can summon a Flowing Shape to assist in combat. Flowing Shapes can copy an undeployed Operator's attributes (Max HP, ATK, DEF, RES, Block Count, Attack Interval, Attack Range, Damage Type, and obtain a special trait depending on whether in melee or ranged form), gain 5 SP after first deployment, will respawn 25 seconds after being defeated

uniequip_002_vigil.name: Leader of the Wolfpack
uniequip_002_vigil.upgradeDescription: Can summon a Wolfpack initially consisting of 3 'Wolf Shadows' at the Tactical Point to assist in combat; The number of 'Wolf Shadows' increases by 1 every 25 seconds (up to a maximum of 3; each 'Wolf Shadow' increases the Wolfpack's Block by 1 and causes its attacks to deal an additional instance of damage; when 'Wolf Shadow' defeated, Wolfpack gain 30% Physical Dodge for 7 seconds)

uniequip_002_vigil.name: Leader of the Wolfpack
uniequip_002_vigil.upgradeDescription: Can summon a Wolfpack initially consisting of 3 'Wolf Shadows' at the Tactical Point to assist in combat; The number of 'Wolf Shadows' increases by 1 every 25 seconds (up to a maximum of 3; each 'Wolf Shadow' increases the Wolfpack's Block by 1 and causes its attacks to deal an additional instance of damage; when 'Wolf Shadow' defeated, Wolfpack gain 50% Physical Dodge for 10 seconds)

uniequip_002_blkngt.name: Nightwalker
uniequip_002_blkngt.upgradeDescription: When there are <$ba.sleep>Sleeping</> enemies enemies within Attack Range, Blacknight and Slumberfoot ATK +5%

uniequip_002_blkngt.name: Nightwalker
uniequip_002_blkngt.upgradeDescription: When there are <$ba.sleep>Sleeping</> enemies enemies within Attack Range, Blacknight and Slumberfoot ATK 10%

uniequip_002_bstalk.name: Professional Breeder
uniequip_002_bstalk.upgradeDescription: Can summon Metal Crabs to assist in combat from a Tactical Point; When blocking enemies, Metal Crabs DEF +10%; Metal Crabs will automatically respawn 15s after being defeated

uniequip_002_bstalk.name: Professional Breeder
uniequip_002_bstalk.upgradeDescription: Can summon Metal Crabs to assist in combat from a Tactical Point; When blocking enemies, Metal Crabs DEF +15%; Metal Crabs will automatically respawn 15s after being defeated

uniequip_002_ascln.name: 死亡拘审
uniequip_002_ascln.upgradeDescription:
Attacks inflict the following effects to enemies:
have -18％ Movement Speed, dealing 11% of Ascalon's ATK as Arts damage per second for 27 seconds (can stack 3 time)

uniequip_002_ascln.name: 死亡拘审
uniequip_002_ascln.upgradeDescription:
Attacks inflict the following effects to enemies:
have -18％ Movement Speed, dealing 11% of Ascalon's ATK as Arts damage per second for 30 seconds (can stack 3 time)

uniequip_002_aroma.name: 起泡性能测试
uniequip_002_aroma.upgradeDescription: The first hit on each enemy deal 115% of ATK as Art damage and <$ba.levitate>Levitate</> it for 2.5 seconds

uniequip_002_aroma.upgradeDescription: The first hit on each enemy deal 120%<@ba.talpu>(+5%)</> of ATK as Art damage and <$ba.levitate>Levitate</> it for 2.5 seconds

uniequip_002_aroma.upgradeDescription: The first hit on each enemy deal 125%<@ba.talpu>(+5%)</> of ATK as Art damage and <$ba.levitate>Levitate</> it for 2.5 seconds

uniequip_002_luton.name: 死里求生
uniequip_002_luton.upgradeDescription: When an enemy blocked by self is killed, restores 18% of Max HP

uniequip_002_luton.name: 死里求生
uniequip_002_luton.upgradeDescription: When an enemy blocked by self is killed, restores 18%<@ba.talpu>(+2%)</> of Max HP

uniequip_002_luton.name: 死里求生
uniequip_002_luton.upgradeDescription: When an enemy blocked by self is killed, restores 20% of Max HP

uniequip_002_luton.name: 死里求生
uniequip_002_luton.upgradeDescription: When an enemy blocked by self is killed, restores 22%<@ba.talpu>(+2%)</> of Max HP

uniequip_003_heyak.name: Bygone Wings
uniequip_003_heyak.upgradeDescription: Applies <$ba.weightless>Weightless</> to enemies with 60% or more HP within Attack Range and 10% <$ba.magicfragile>[Arts Fragility]</> to enemies with 50% or less HP within Attack Range

uniequip_003_heyak.name: Bygone Wings
uniequip_003_heyak.upgradeDescription: Applies <$ba.weightless>Weightless</> to enemies with 50% or more HP within Attack Range and 20% <$ba.magicfragile>[Arts Fragility]</> to enemies with 50% or less HP within Attack Range
